title: vincent l. ott
text:
tutorial | preprint | blogpost
JASP is a free statistics program with a convenient graphical user interface.
With it, you can easily create incredibly useful raincloud plots.

title: vincent l. ott
text:
astronaut spacewalking
A spacewalk is “any activity in outer space outside a spacecraft” (Wikipedia).








Based on the paper by Corlett et al. (2020). Bottom plot done in mere clicks.
Technically, both space and moon walk times are shown (extravehicular activity).
